properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-csv.allow-empty-stream
properties.description: Whether to allow empty streams in the unmarshal process. If true, no exception will be thrown when a body without records is provided.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-csv.class-type
properties.description: Name of model class to use.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-csv.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the bindy-csv data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-csv.locale
properties.description: To configure a default locale to use, such as us for united states. To use the JVM platform default locale then use the name default

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-csv.type
properties.description: Whether to use Csv, Fixed, or KeyValue.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-csv.unwrap-single-instance
properties.description: When unmarshalling should a single instance be unwrapped and returned instead of wrapped in a java.util.List.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-fixed.allow-empty-stream
properties.description: Whether to allow empty streams in the unmarshal process. If true, no exception will be thrown when a body without records is provided.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-fixed.class-type
properties.description: Name of model class to use.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-fixed.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the bindy-fixed data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-fixed.locale
properties.description: To configure a default locale to use, such as us for united states. To use the JVM platform default locale then use the name default

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-fixed.type
properties.description: Whether to use Csv, Fixed, or KeyValue.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-fixed.unwrap-single-instance
properties.description: When unmarshalling should a single instance be unwrapped and returned instead of wrapped in a java.util.List.

properties.description: Whether to allow empty streams in the unmarshal process. If true, no exception will be thrown when a body without records is provided.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-kvp.class-type
properties.description: Name of model class to use.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-kvp.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the bindy-kvp data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-kvp.locale
properties.description: To configure a default locale to use, such as us for united states. To use the JVM platform default locale then use the name default

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-kvp.type
properties.description: Whether to use Csv, Fixed, or KeyValue.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.bindy-kvp.unwrap-single-instance
properties.description: When unmarshalling should a single instance be unwrapped and returned instead of wrapped in a java.util.List.
